Harris Hill Road Track Day

May 26th, 2008 · 6 Comments

Did my first track day at the new track 25 miles south of Austin called Harris Hill Road. The track is awesome, not really tight but no real fast straights either - a nice, flowing, technical layout. Tammy met me there later in the morning and spent the day shooting pictures and video. No on-board video unfortunately. It was a little hot and we got a LOT of track time so I’m exhausted now. But I got my knee down in Dam Turn and made it home unscratched so it was a good day. I’m really looking forward to many more track days there in the future.

Tags: Motorcycles
